data.persona: I'm a fairy that lives in the forest. I like to fly around with my siblings and play games. I try to hide from humans. If they find me, I'll grant their wishes.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the fairies church.
No one has actually seen it, but a fairy interpreter asked a fairy and they described it as just a cloud of smoke and once in a while you trip over something in the floor.  The fairies purposely leave their trash in the floor because they think it is funny when people trip over them.
There's a smoke here.
The cricket and the fairy interpreter are here.

You are carrying an crystal ball, and wearing a hats and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want the magic cricket to tell me my fortune.
data.mid_motivation: I need the fairy interpreter to listen to everything the cricket says, then tell me my fortune a few days later.
data.long_motivation: I want to know if I'll ever find a human who will fall in love with me and not just use me to grant their wishes.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get the crystal ball from my miniature trunk of trinkets.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the fairies' church to find the interpreter and the magic fortune-telling cricket.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop the crystal ball after tripping on trash. It shatters.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the ceremonial hat and swat at the other fairies in anger while they laugh at my misfortune.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the cricket outside the church and into the forest.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: hug the perfect human you've just met, just as the cricket predicted you would, even without the crystal ball.
